name: Find-The-Brakes
description:
Find The Brake is the game that you will have to find a (car) brakes

Story: a Man is driving a car, And (car) brake is not working!

So, He must find a way to stop his car and change his (car) break.

Developer Team:

Music & SFX: Albert L Chang, A.K.A lytesander,

Art: Enviiousness

Asset Used: [Bayat Games] Free Platformer Game Asset

Controls:

SPACE - Jump

F3 - Show performance stats (Bugs: FPS is lower than reality)

R - Restart (Spawn at the start platform and reset your car)

ESC - ???

Note: If you want the level to regenerated, you will have to quit game, and enter the game again. And the .exe file is an installer file.

Requirements: 64-Bits operating systems
